header.tagline: Full Stack Developer & Tech Content Creator

paragraphs: üëã Welcome! I'm Shishir, a passionate Full Stack Developer and Tech Content Creator with a love for building innovative digital solutions that make a real impact.

üöÄ I specialize in modern web technologies, cloud architecture, and creating scalable applications. When I'm not coding, you'll find me sharing knowledge through technical content, tutorials, and engaging with the developer community.

üí° I believe in the power of technology to solve real-world problems and am always excited to collaborate on projects that push the boundaries of what's possible. Let's build something amazing together!

items.name: Modern Portfolio Website
description: A fully responsive, modern portfolio website built with vanilla JavaScript and advanced CSS
Features dark/light mode toggle, smooth animations, and dynamic content loading
Optimized for performance with lazy loading, SEO optimization, and accessibility features
Configurable through JSON with automated deployment and GitHub integration

items.name: Tech Content Platform
description: Creating engaging technical content across multiple platforms including YouTube and Hashnode
Developing tutorials, code walkthroughs, and educational content for developers
Building a community of learners and sharing best practices in web development
Focus on practical, real-world applications and modern development workflows

responsibilities: Developing and maintaining scalable web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks
Implementing responsive designs and ensuring cross-browser compatibility
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions
Optimizing application performance and implementing best practices for code quality
Creating technical documentation and mentoring junior developers
Creating educational content on web development, programming concepts, and tech trends
Building and engaging with a community of developers and tech enthusiasts
Producing high-quality video tutorials and written articles on technical topics
Collaborating with other creators and participating in tech community events
Staying updated with latest technologies and sharing insights with the community
